entry.title: Saturday night: Clear. Low 11.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light late this evening. Low 11. Forecast issued 6:12 PM EDT Saturday 15 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday: A few showers. High 26.
entry.summary: Sunny. Increasing cloudiness in the afternoon then a few showers. Risk of a thunderstorm late in the afternoon. Wind south 20 km/h gusting to 50 becoming southeast 40 gusting to 60 early in the afternoon then becoming southwest 40 gusting to 60. High 26. Humidex 29. UV index 8 or very high. Forecast issued 6:12 PM EDT Saturday 15 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of rain. Low 8. POP 30%
entry.summary: A few showers ending in the evening then cloudy with 30 percent chance of rain. Risk of a thunderstorm early in the evening. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low 8. Forecast issued 6:12 PM EDT Saturday 15 April 2023
